abilities.name: Oathband Bodyguard
abilities.rule: While a **CHARACTER** is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than this unit’s Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Teleport Crest
abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Deep Strike ability.

abilities.name: Weavefield Crest
abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_abilities.name: Teleport Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Deep Strike ability.

wargear_abilities.name: Weavefield Crest
wargear_abilities.rule: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear_options: ■ All models in this unit can each have their concussion gauntlet replaced with 1 plasma blade gauntlet.
■ All models in this unit can each have their EtaCarn plasma gun replaced with 1 volkanite disintegrator.
■ The Hesyr’s weavefield crest can be replaced with 1 teleport crest.
■ The Hesyr’s concussion gauntlet or plasma blade gauntlet can be replaced with 1 concussion hammer.
unit_composition:
■ **1 Hesyr**
■ **4-9 Hearthguard**

**Every model is equipped with:** EtaCarn plasma gun; exo-armour grenade launcher; concussion gauntlet.

**The Hesyr is additionally equipped with:** weavefield crest.
